    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030807</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030807</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Importancia biológica de los microorganismos y ciclos geoquímicos</string>
            <string language="en">Biological importance of micro organisms and geochemical cycles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologischer Wert der Mikroorganismen und der 
geochemischen Schleifen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Importance biologique des organizations micro et 
des cycles géochimiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Importância biológica de micro organismos e de 
ciclos geochemical</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Importanza biologica di micro organismi e dei 
cicli geochimici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βιολογική σημασία των οργανισμών μικροϋπολογιστών και
των γεωχημικών κύκλων</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Refleja el papel que cumplen los microorganismos en los ecosistemas y enumera las aplicaciones biotecnológicas de estos microorganismos. Además, se describe cómo son los ciclos geoquímicas y la función de los microorganismos en ellos.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic reflecting the role played by micro organisms in ecosystems and the biotechnological applications of these micro organisms. There is also a description of geochemical cycles and the function of micro organisms in them.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ciclos geoquímicos</string>
            <string language="en">geochemical cycles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">microorganismos</string>
            <string language="en">microorganisms</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Thema, welches die Rolle reflektiert, spielte
durch Mikroorganismen in den Oekosystemen und die biotechnological 
Anwendungen dieser Mikroorganismen. Es gibt auch eine 
Beschreibung der geochemischen Schleifen und der Funktion der 
Mikroorganismen in ihnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le sujet reflétant le rôle a joué par les 
organizations micro dans les écosystèmes et les applications 
biotechnological de ces organizations micro. Il y a également 
une description des cycles géochimiques et de la fonction des 
organizations micro dans elles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O tópico que reflete o papel jogou por micro 
organismos nos ecosystems e pelas aplicações biotechnological destes
micro organismos. Há também uma descrição de ciclos 
geochemical e da função de micro organismos neles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il soggetto che riflette il ruolo ha giocato dai 
micro organismi negli ecosistemi e dalle applicazioni biotechnological
di questi micro organismi. Ci è egualmente una descrizione dei 
cicli geochimici e della funzione di micro organismi in loro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που απεικονίζει το ρόλο που διαδραματίζεται από 
τους οργανισμούς μικροϋπολογιστών στα οικοσυστήματα και τις 
βιοτεχνολογικές εφαρμογές αυτών των οργανισμών μικροϋπολογιστών.
Υπάρχει επίσης μια περιγραφή των γεωχημικών κύκλων και η 
λειτουργία των οργανισμών μικροϋπολογιστών σε τους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geochemische Schleifen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mikroorganismen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cycles géochimiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
